label: Superseded / Replaced
description: The model is being retired because a new model (internal or vendor-sourced) has been approved to take over its specific function.

label: Merged / Consolidated
description: The model's logic has been absorbed into a larger, aggregate system or model; the distinct entity no longer exists.

label: Business Exit
description: The specific business line, product, or activity supported by the model has ceased.

label: Below Materiality Threshold
description: Transaction or usage volume has dropped below the regulatory or policy threshold required to be classified as a 'Model'.

label: Performance Failure
description: The model is being retired due to irreparable accuracy degradation, instability, or failure to meet validation standards.

label: Data Source Sunset
description: Critical input data feeds are no longer available or reliable, rendering the model inoperable.

label: Regulatory Change
description: New external regulations or internal policy changes have rendered the model non-compliant or obsolete.
